extendedInfo.description: Peace! Stop the war!Feel free to download this nice sticker widget. It's a must have addition to your background.Some cool features:* Choose between 5 different sticker colors.* Touch link. You can link the widget to a desired website.* Text below widget. You can add a text under the sticker with a particular color.* No annoying push/notification adds! Just normal ones.* Format 2x2Errors, feedback, suggestions for apps/widgets? flowappsinfo [at] gmail [dot] com

reviews.title: I just deleted the data after the upgrade.
reviews.comment: You only added a adware file in the upgrade... for something that does nothing and a \'sticker\' only is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great sticker.
reviews.comment: If you want a big peace sign on your homescreen, look no further. Customize it\'s color, add some text beneath, even turn the widget into a clickable browser shortcut that opens any page you like.  If you\'re into badges and stickers, you\'ll like it. Plus it has *some* practical value, as it can be used to open a browser bookmark.  9 of 10 starz0rz =)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot Get It To Work..
reviews.comment: on the S4 :/ Worked fine on HTC One X+.  Sighs.. Uninstalled
reviews.author: manic angel
